translations: 遏制者，破坏者；庞然大物；非凡的人或物；小鬼，小家伙（蔑称）；茁壮的孩子

sentences.sentence: Hoover was building his reputation as a crime-buster.
sentences.translation: 胡佛作为罪犯克星的名声越来越大。

sentences.sentence: These door buster deals will last until July 31, 2013.
sentences.translation: 这些广告商品交易将持续到2013年7月31日。

sentences.sentence: Stress is a known memory buster.
sentences.translation: 我们知道，压力是占用记忆的大块头。
